column1: # Title: Demand income elasticity as a function of per-capita industrial output
# Units: GJ per person per year for pc.output_GJ; Unitless for inc_elas
# Description: inc_elas: income elasticity (unitless); pc.output_GJ: per-capita output in GJ per person per year
column2: Steel production is corrected for real production in 2020 (based on gssp2)
column3: and future demand changes refer to relevant studies (Wang et al
column5: doi: 10.13198/j.issn.1001-6929.2021.11.11). Default assumptions in GCAM Global have been used for other demand.
